a.title: Request an official High School Transcript
a.span: Request an official High School Transcript

li.a: Request an official High School Transcript

span.span: Welcome to Altamont Community Unit School District. Altamont CUSD 10 is a Pre-K-12 district serving 646 students. The district is made up of two schools: Altamont Grade School and Altamont High School.

ACUSD offers parents and students a safe and nurturing environment, with a small school culture based on positive relationships. Our students and teachers are equipped with the latest technology and 21st century skills allowing for outstanding classroom environments.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

li.span: Altamont High School has been recognized by U.S. News & World Report as a top performing school for 5 consecutive years (2012-2016).
1:1 technology is offered to all students in grades 3-12.
A variety of extra-curricular clubs and athletics are offered at both schools.
